Opcode, Rnd, Operand A, Operand B, Operand C, Result
ADD, RND_NEAREST, 0x3ff0000000000000, 0x4000000000000000, 0x4008000000000000, 0x4010000000000000
MUL, RND_ZERO, 0x4000000000000000, 0x4010000000000000, 0x0000000000000000, 0x4020000000000000
CMPEQ, RND_NEAREST, 0x7ff8000000000000, 0x0000000000000000, 0x7ff8000000000000, 0x0000000000000000
FMA, RND_NEAREST, 0xfff0000000000001, 0xfff0000000000003, 0xfff0000000000005, 0xfff8000000000003
FMA, RND_NEAREST, 0xfff0000000000001, 0x0000000000000001, 0xfff0000000000003, 0xfff8000000000003
FMA, RND_NEAREST, 0xfff0000000000008, 0x0000000000000001, 0x0000000000000001, 0xfff8000000000008
